department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. please see the notice of solicitation corrective
description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 26 2023 at 02:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 02:00pm EST will result in the  bid being declared non-responsive
